articles.description: The Los Angeles Lakers will not participate in the  NBA  postseason.   They were eliminated from playoff contention by the combination of their loss to the Phoenix Suns and the San Antonio Spurs' road win over the Denver Nuggets...
articles.content:
David Zalubowski/Associated Press
The Los Angeles Lakers will not participate in the NBA postseason.
